name: SillyFactory
description:
Silly factory. A game made for the "Low Effort Jam", but joined to the "2-button Jame"... Just cause. I needed to relax and unwind and decided to come up with this.

You are a factory worker, managing the machines transporting food. Catch the food as requested by your superviser.

Use left and right arrows to move the belt left or right. 

Ensure your reputation remains above 0 by not catching the wrong food.

And earn as much as you again.

Again, low effort... to lazy to put in music...
